title: Zucchini with Parmesan Crumbs
introduction: Buttery, cheesy bread crumbs flavor this zucchini gratin, making it a delightful side dish that combines the tenderness of zucchini with the savory richness of Parmesan.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted and cooled
instructions: Scrub the zucchini with a brush under cold running water. Trim off the ends.
Place a rack in the center of the oven. Preheat oven to 425°F. Butter a 13 × 9 × 2–inch baking dish.

Spread the zucchini slices in the baking dish, overlapping slightly. In a medium bowl, mix together the butter, crumbs, cheese, and salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle the crumb mixture over the zucchini.
Bake 30 minutes or until the crumbs are golden and the zucchini are tender. Serve hot.
